Account - Class in Unnamed Package
The Account class represents a general bank account with an account number and a balance.

Default constructor that initializes an empty Account object.

Constructor with parameters to initialize an Account with a specified account number and balance.

A factory class for creating different types of accounts.

Default constructor.

The unique number associated with the account.

Adds a new customer to the system by prompting for personal and account information.

Adds a transaction record for a specified account type, including details such as the starting balance, ending balance, and a transaction description.

The Credit class represents a credit account.
